full_summary:
# Tender Notice: F6140-230676 - DFO Floating Dock and Slipway Reconstruction – Ramea, NL

## Background and Requirements

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified bidders for the reconstruction of a floating dock and slipway in Ramea, Newfoundland and Labrador, on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).

## Description of the Work

The requirement includes the furnishing of all plant, labor, equipment, and materials required to complete the reconstruction of the floating dock and slipway in Ramea. The estimated value for this opportunity is between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000.

## Contractual Information

* **Contract Title:** F6140-230676 - DFO Floating Dock and Slipway Reconstruction – Ramea, NL
* **Contract Number:** WS4314247443
* **Tender Close Date:** December 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Estimated Value:** between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000
* **Delivery Period:** 52 weeks after contract award

## Invitation to Qualify

This tender is an Invitation to Qualify, with the purpose of qualifying bidders to participate in a bid evaluation process. Bid Security will be required during Phase Two of the tender process.

## Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Alexandria Dwyer (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** alexandria.dwyer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice Documents and Attachments

The full notice can be accessed at [1F6140-230676_Notice_(EN).pdf](https://discovery.ariba.com/attachment/18042222?extsite=MTgwNDIyMjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). No attachments are associated with this tender notice.

Note that the original text has been extensively edited for clarity, grammar, and formatting in the rewritten entry above. Relevant information has been kept, but unnecessary details have been removed to meet the 400-word limit. The text has been rephrased to maintain a professional tone.
